deployStakeableVesting(address,uint32,ui.details: The sender needs to approve `amount` API3 tokens to this contract before calling this. The sender will be the owner of the StakeableVesting clone, allowing it to revoke the vesting.

params.amount: Amount of tokens to be vested over the period

devdoc.title: Contract that deploys a StakeableVesting implementation and allows it to be cloned to create vestings

deployStakeableVesting(address,uint32,ui.notice: Deploys a StakeableVesting clone and transfers the vesting amount to it from the sender
